eligibility.additionalInfo: Australian Citizens or permanent residents or as otherwise approved
Borrower must be minimum age of 18 years old
Secured by residential and/or commercial property

fees.name: AGENTS_COST_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Not ascertainable, and payable to us or our solicitor or our or their agent

fees.name: CHEQUE_ISSUING_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to us when a payment is made from your loan account by way of Financial Institution (FI) Cheque

fees.name: COMMITMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: It is charged on the unused portion of the facility limit. It is calculated daily from the date two months after the date of the Facility Offer until the facility is fully drawn

fees.name: CONSENT_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to us when you ask us to consent to leasing, subdividing or any other dealing in relation to the security property

fees.name: DEFAULT_ADMINISTRATION_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to us when the borrower (or security provider) has not performed an obligation on time including an obligation to pay money. This fee is payable monthly commencing one month after the obligation should have been performed and up to and including the month in which the obligation is performed. We debit this fees to tour loan account each month until the default is remedied.

fees.name: DISCHARGE_ADMINISTRATION_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to us each time we release a security

fees.name: DISHONOUR_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to us when a payment (such as as a direct debit, salary deduction or cheque) is dishonoured

fees.name: DUPLICATE_STATEMENT_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to us when we provide a copy of a statement

fees.name: DUPLICATE_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to us when we provide a copy of a document

fees.name: INFORMATION_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: $1.00 per minute ($20.00 minimum fee). The fee will be calulated on the actual time spent retrieving and providing the information requested.Payable to us to provide information and that information is provided in writing

fees.name: LOAN_APPLICATION_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Available at the time the application is made minimum application fee $250

fees.name: LOAN/OVERDRAFT_SERVICE_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Minimum fee $50.00 Amount available on application. Fee is debited on your account quarterly in arrears on the last day of March, June, September and December

fees.name: PRODUCTION_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Per document per production. Payable to use if we produce a document to a land registry

fees.name: PROGRESS_PAYMENT_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Minimum $100 per progress payment on a building or construction loan. Payable whenever a progress payment is made on a building or construction loan.

fees.name: RENEGOTIATION_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Available on application. Payable to us whenever we agree to renegotiate or vary conditions on your loan other than altering interest rate options

fees.name: SECURITY_SUBSTITUTION_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Per new security. Payable to us to substitute a new security for an existing one

fees.name: SETTLEMENT_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Per settlement. Payable to us each time we or our solicitor attend settlement in connection with a security

fees.name: SWITCHING_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Per switch. Payable to us to convert from one interest rate option to another on an existing loan or switch to another of our loan products

fees.name: TITLE_SEARCH_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Not Ascertainable, payable to us to us or our solicitor or our or their agent on or before the settlement date

fees.name: VALUATION_FEE_(PROGRESS_VALUATION)_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Valuation fees are available upon enquiry. Payable in relation to each property or business to which a loan is secured

fees.name: VALUATION_FEE_COMM
fees.additionalInfo: Valuation fees are upon enquiry. Payable in relation to each property or business to which a loan is secured

data.name: Commercial Loan - Variable Rate
data.description: The Mutual Bank's Commercial Loan can help you achieve your business goals. If are expanding your business, or looking to acquire a commercial property, talk to our business banking specialists about
